title: Birmingham PD investigates after child accidentally shoots himself
content:
BIRMINGHAM, AL (WBRC) -
Birmingham police are investigating after a young boy showed up at Children's of Alabama with a self-inflicted gunshot wound to one of his hands.
Authorities say the boy told them he found a gun in an alley in the 5500 block of Avenue 0. Officers are still gathering information on the case.
